title: Qualcomm - AI Emotion Recognition Through Audio & Video
subtitle: Using non-traditional computer vision analysis of voice recordings to identify emotion in video
description: We were invited by Qualcomm to participate in a hackathon challenge where we had to identify the perceived emotion by using a combination of audio and video files provided
